metadata.title: CVE-2019-9720 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the subtitle decoder in Libav 12.3 allowsattackers to corrupt the stack via a crafted video file in Matroska format,because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c misuses snprintf.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
